name: The Woods (itch) (Thighs)
description:
This is my interactive short story for Halloween of 2020, which might become a yearly tradition.

I wanted to develop my skills with Twine a little more, after enjoying it in the past. I also wanted to get some practice in writing spooky scenes and in programming adventure game-y elements into a story.

So, 'The Woods' was born.

Enjoy making a slew of decisions with varying results and consequences. See if you can find the 'true' ending.

Wordcount: 7,705 words.

Endings: 5-ish.
